divs: Sighting DetailsI have tried to send this message once before and did not get through. I am a professional business person in my mid 50's. I have a picture and information that you will be very interested in at the least. This in fact may be what you have been looking for. I am afraid of the overall situation and where I think it may lead. I have told my wife that I will try to forget about again starting next week. I have met with the grandson of James Forrestal recently if that tells you anything. My research has lead me to a very frightening conclusion. If you want to discuss this before I change my mind please call me right away. Sincerely, Chris
